scenario(String, OutlineDescriptor<T>) - Static method in class com.ckeiner.testbddy.api.BddSuite
Creates a ScenarioOutline with the specified description and descriptor.
The behavior and test data of the ScenarioOutline is contained in the OutlineDescriptor.

Creates a pending Scenario with the specified description.

ScenarioOutline<T> - Class in com.ckeiner.testbddy.core.bdd.scenario

It is the same as a Scenario except that it has test data.
